title: Rams-Patriots Recap: Jarrett Stidham replaces Cam Newton as Sean McVay gets best of Bill Belichick this time (Football 12/11)
description:
Want winning picks each morning in under 10 minutes? Subscribe to 'The Early Edge: A Daily SportsLine Betting Podcast' on Apple, Spotify, Stitcher or wherever else you listen to podcasts.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Was Thursday Night Football all that different from Super Bowl 53? Well, we had a different winner, but the outcome never seemed in doubt, much like 2 years ago. The Rams easily took care of the Patriots 24-3 this time, as Sean McVay topped Bill Belichick in a regular season battle. Cam Newton was not good once again and that probably marks the end of New England's postseason chances. Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson and Tyler Sullivan to break down all you need to know from TNF including the Pats outlook and if Los Angeles is a serious Super Bowl contender.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @TylerSully, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
